PymtSchdDistributionMethod.name: PymtSchdDistributionMethod
PymtSchdDistributionMethod.description: Represents information about the partial payments that the total payment is divided into.

Description.description: The user-entered details of the payment schedule distribution method.

DistributionCount.description: Required. The number of payment schedule items for the payment schedule. The payment schedule items are used to distribute the payment scheduleâ€™s total payment into partial payments.

DistributionMethodType.description: Required. The time interval of the payment distribution method.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: Required. The user-entered name for the payment schedule distribution method.

OwnerId.description: Required. The ID of the owner of the PaymentScheduleDistributionMethod record.
